title: Root settings data scheme
description: A data scheme for describing the root settings of the middleware, such as the URL it should be hosted on

incomingWebId.description: The WebID to which requests will be sent, e.g. https://proxy.geens.cloud/jesse/

forwardWebId.description: The URL to which requests should be forwarded, e.g. https://pod.geens.cloud/jesse/

privacyPreferences.description: Describes the privacy settings of the user, i.e. which privacy levels are requested

schemes.description: In this field, privacy levels can be mapped to specific data schemes, such that for more/less sensitive schemes a privacy level can be chosen that differs from the default
